title: Relate Hilbert space to ZFC pre-Hilbert and Hilbert spaces

blocks.name: hhcms
blocks.content: The Hilbert space induced metric determines a complete metric space. (Contributed by NM, 10-Apr-2008.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 14-May-2014.) (Proof shortened by Peter Mazsa, 2-Oct-2022.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm hhcms(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wcel(c0, cfv(ccmet, chba))
  -| wceq(c1, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cims, c1))
} = {
  iscmet3i(hs0, c0, chba, cfv(cmopn, c0))
  hhmet(c0, c1)
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccau, c0)), wf(cv(hs0), cn, chba)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c0)))), wrex(hs1, chba, wbr(cv(hs0), chli, cv(hs1))))
  sylbir(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccau, c0)), wf(cv(hs0), cn, chba)), wrex(hs1, chba, wbr(cv(hs0), chli, cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs0), ccauold))
  bitri(wcel(cv(hs0), ccauold), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccau, c0)), wf(cv(hs0), cn, chba)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cfv(ccau, c0), co(chba, cmap, cn))))
  eleq2i(cv(hs0), ccauold, cin(cfv(ccau, c0), co(chba, cmap, cn)))
  hhcau(c0, c1)
  bitri(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cfv(ccau, c0), co(chba, cmap, cn))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccau, c0)), wf(cv(hs0), cn, chba)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccau, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(chba, cmap, cn))))
  elin(cv(hs0), cfv(ccau, c0), co(chba, cmap, cn))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccau, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(chba, cmap, cn)), wf(cv(hs0), cn, chba))
  elmap(cv(hs0), chba, cn)
  ax-hilex()
  nnex()
  ax-hcompl(hs1, cv(hs0))
  rexlimivw(hs1, chba, wbr(cv(hs0), chli, cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c0)))))
  simplbiim(wbr(cv(hs0), chli, cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(chba, cmap, cn)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c0)), cv(hs1)))
  bitri(wbr(cv(hs0), chli, cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(chba, cmap, cn)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c0)), cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs0), cres(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c0)), co(chba, cmap, cn)), cv(hs1)))
  breqi(cv(hs0), chli, cv(hs1), cres(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c0)), co(chba, cmap, cn)))
  hhlm(cfv(cmopn, c0), c1, c0)
  eqid(cfv(cmopn, c0))
  brresi(cv(hs0), cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c0)), co(chba, cmap, cn), cv(hs1))
  breldm(cv(hs0), cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c0)), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(chba)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cmopn, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, c0)))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hhcms(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ c0 ∈(CMet ` ~H)
  ⊣ c1 = < < +h, .h >, normh >
  ⊣ c0 =(IndMet ` c1)
} = {
  iscmet3i(hs0, c0, chba, (MetOpen ` c0))
  hhmet(c0, c1)
  syl((hs0 ∈(Cau ` c0)∧(hs0 : ℕ → ~H)), hs0 ∈ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c0))), ∃(hs1 ∈ ~H, hs0[~~>v]hs1))
  sylbir((hs0 ∈(Cau ` c0)∧(hs0 : ℕ → ~H)), ∃(hs1 ∈ ~H, hs0[~~>v]hs1), hs0 ∈ Cauchy)
  bitri(hs0 ∈ Cauchy, (hs0 ∈(Cau ` c0)∧(hs0 : ℕ → ~H)), hs0 ∈((Cau ` c0)⋂(~H[↦]ℕ)))
  eleq2i(hs0, ccauold, ((Cau ` c0)⋂(~H[↦]ℕ)))
  hhcau(c0, c1)
  bitri(hs0 ∈((Cau ` c0)⋂(~H[↦]ℕ)), (hs0 ∈(Cau ` c0)∧(hs0 : ℕ → ~H)), (hs0 ∈(Cau ` c0)∧ hs0 ∈(~H[↦]ℕ)))
  elin(hs0, (Cau ` c0), (~H[↦]ℕ))
  anbi2i(hs0 ∈(Cau ` c0), hs0 ∈(~H[↦]ℕ), (hs0 : ℕ → ~H))
  elmap(hs0, chba, cn)
  ax-hilex()
  nnex()
  ax-hcompl(hs1, hs0)
  rexlimivw(hs1, chba, hs0[~~>v]hs1, hs0 ∈ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c0))))
  simplbiim(hs0[~~>v]hs1, hs0 ∈ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c0))), hs0 ∈(~H[↦]ℕ), hs0[(~~>t `(MetOpen ` c0))]hs1)
  bitri(hs0[~~>v]hs1, (hs0 ∈(~H[↦]ℕ)∧ hs0[(~~>t `(MetOpen ` c0))]hs1), hs0[((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c0))|`(~H[↦]ℕ))]hs1)
  breqi(hs0, chli, hs1, ((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c0))|`(~H[↦]ℕ)))
  hhlm((MetOpen ` c0), c1, c0)
  eqid((MetOpen ` c0))
  brresi(hs0, (~~>t `(MetOpen ` c0)), (~H[↦]ℕ), hs1)
  breldm(hs0, (~~>t `(MetOpen ` c0)), hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(chba)
  diff.hs0.c((MetOpen ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 ∈ dom((~~>t `(MetOpen ` c0))))
}

blocks.name: hhhl
blocks.content: The Hilbert space structure is a complex Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 10-Apr-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm hhhl(class c0) {
  |- wcel(c0, chlo)
  -| wceq(c0, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
} = {
  mpbir2an(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c0, ccbn), wcel(c0, ccphlo))
  mpbir2an(wcel(c0, ccbn), wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(cfv(cims, c0), cfv(ccmet, chba)))
  hhnv(c0)
  hhcms(cfv(cims, c0), c0)
  iscbn(c0, cfv(cims, c0), chba)
  hhba(c0)
  eqid(cfv(cims, c0))
  hhph(c0)
  ishlo(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hhhl(class c0) {
  ⊢ c0 ∈ CHilOLD
  ⊣ c0 = < < +h, .h >, normh >
} = {
  mpbir2an(c0 ∈ CHilOLD, c0 ∈ CBan, c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD)
  mpbir2an(c0 ∈ CBan, c0 ∈ NrmCVec, (IndMet ` c0)∈(CMet ` ~H))
  hhnv(c0)
  hhcms((IndMet ` c0), c0)
  iscbn(c0, (IndMet ` c0), chba)
  hhba(c0)
  eqid((IndMet ` c0))
  hhph(c0)
  ishlo(c0)
}

blocks.name: hilcms
blocks.content: The Hilbert space norm determines a complete metric space. (Contributed by NM, 17-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: hilhl
blocks.content: The Hilbert space of the Hilbert Space Explorer is a complex Hilbert space. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 29-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
